title: WiceCRM
description: WiceCRM component for the elastic.io platform

getPersonsPolling.title: Fetch new and updated persons(getPersons - Polling)
getPersonsPolling.description: Get WiceCRM persons which have recently been modified or created

getDeletedPersonsPolling.title: Fetch deleted persons (getDeletedPersons - Polling)
getDeletedPersonsPolling.description: Get WiceCRM persons which have recently been deleted

getOrganizationsPolling.title: Fetch new and updated organizations(getOrganizations- Polling)
getOrganizationsPolling.description: Get WiceCRM organizations which have recently been modified or created

getDeletedOrganizationsPolling.title: Fetch deleted organizations (getDeletedOrganizations - Polling)
getDeletedOrganizationsPolling.description: Get WiceCRM organizations which have recently been deleted

getArticlesPolling.title: Fetch new and updated articles(getArticles- Polling)
getArticlesPolling.description: Get WiceCRM articles which have recently been modified or created

lookupPerson.title: Lookup Person
lookupPerson.description: Given an id, fetches the corresponding person.

lookupOrganization.title: Lookup Organization
lookupOrganization.description: Given an id, fetches the corresponding organization.

lookupArticle.title: Lookup Article
lookupArticle.description: Given an id, fetches the corresponding article.

upsertPerson.title: Upsert Person
upsertPerson.description: Update an existing person if it already exists. Otherwise create a new one.

upsertOrganization.title: Upsert Organization
upsertOrganization.description: Update an existing organization if it already exists. Otherwise create a new one.

upsertArticle.title: Upsert Article
upsertArticle.description: Update an existing article if it already exists. Otherwise create a new one.

deletePerson.title: Delete Person
deletePerson.description: Given an id, deletes the corresponding person.

deleteOrganization.title: Delete Organization
deleteOrganization.description: Given an id, deletes the corresponding organization.

deleteArticle.title: Delete Article
deleteArticle.description: Given an id, deletes the corresponding article.
